I finally saw this Samsung and a comparable Sony side to side, and there wasn't any comparison. This Samsung TV is so far superior in image quality that there's just no comparison with any other brand. I really don't care about 3D, and I haven't had a chance to explore any of the "smart" features. After 4 months of viewing, this TV has been absolutely flawless with a gorgeous image.

Reviews.Title: Dropped frames
Reviews.Author: M. Trandafir
Reviews.Content: First, a few pros and cons, to get them out of the way.Pros:- Color management and extensive calibration controls.- IPS panel.- Web streaming.- Nice design.Cons:- Severe and irregular backlight bleeding. This might not be too visible in a bright environment. In a dim environment (my case), I managed to bring it down to an acceptable level by dimming the backlight.- Buttons on the remote are flush, which makes it hard to figure them out by touch. Really annoying. This seems to be a problem with all recent Samsung remotes (I had a Samsung BD player - which I also returned for other reasons - with a very similar remote).- I could not find a way to make the TV automatically switch between full aspect ratio - for widescreen (16:9) signals - and pillarbox (black vertical bars on each side) for standard (4:3) signals. I was stuck with either horizontally stretched or letterboxed images. Again, really annoying. The Sony TV that replaced this one does it nicely. If there is a way to achieve this on the Samsung, please disregard (and let me know how - just curios).- Clumsy DLNA. The TV refused to play my WMA lossless tracks, or any tracks it could not decode itself, for that matter. Again, the Sony TV has no problems here - I could even stream FLAC on it. All the TV needs to do is tell the PC to do the decoding and send everything as LPCM. Simple, but the Samsung didn't do it. Noticed the same thing on DLNA-enabled Samsung BD players.But the real deal breaker was that the TV was dropping frames. Every once in a while, especially after scene transitions, the image would stutter a few times. The TV was connected directly to the cable outlet so I thought it could not decode the signal in time. I hooked it to a cable box through an HDMI cable and nothing changed. I figured the dejudder circuitry was not keeping up, but no matter how I set up the dejudder controls (Clear Motion settings, or whatever they call it), it kept doing it. Ironically, it was more visible with dejudder turned on, when the image was more fluid, beating the whole purpose. Both my wife and son noticed it so it wasn't just me. I also searched the web and it seems others reported dropped frame problems with similar Samsung models.Was mine defective? I doubt this can be caused by defective hardware so I just returned it and didn't look back.

Reviews.Title: I'm Amazed!!!
Reviews.Author: ck4ever
Reviews.Content: When I got the tv, it was nicely packaged.  I set it up and turn on the power.  The picture was so vivid and clear.  You don't even need to play around with the setting.  If you want the screen to be a little brighter, just increase the back light on the eco sensor setting.  Great led hdtv!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46D6300
Reviews.Author: Lucretia
Reviews.Content: Waited too long to order Consumer Reports-recommended Samsung LN46C530 model, so evaluated Amazon customer reviews and found this one highly recommended.  Got it at a great price Good Friday weekend.  It's very lightweight, was easy to mount and hookups were simple.  Picture quality is very good, sound is just fine (we're not audiophiles). Picture size and other adjustments are fairly simple using the extensive menu options. We're not using the Smart Hub--our internet service is inadequate to support streaming video, and web browsing proved to be agonizingly slow.  We purchased the Qwerty keyboard,  but it won't get much use until we have access to higher speed internet service.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Gregd
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Great Deal. Highly recommend this set. Great picture from all angles. Sounds not too bad, but if you have a surround sound system even better. If you are looking for a large screen LED this is the one...

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: mickey
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV as a gift to my parents in India. It shipped in 4 days to India. TV works awesome. The only problem is that it does not support PAL. so, had to buy a converter for Indian cable. great buy, highly recommended, But does not have wifi and does not have 3D.

Reviews.Title: Still amazing 18 months later
Reviews.Author: Alberto Gomez
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model in April 2010 and never got around to reviewing it. It's been 18 months and it is still working flawlessly. I had compared this model in person side-by-side with the then-latest LG, Sony, and Sharp LEDs and Samsung earned my purchase. Samsung has the best contrast and most vivid colors of any other TV I've seen, and friends that purchased Sony LEDs agree with me. Pack this baby up with a SquareTrade 4 year warranty on Amazon and you're good to go, totally safe to anything that happens to the TV within 4 years. You can't go wrong. This TV has nearly the best image that is possible, so the only thing to worry about is reliability, and the 4 year warranty should settle any concern over that.I used this TV with my PC, connected by HDMI, and it was AWESOME for movie viewing and for gaming. Connected by HDMI you can use the MotionPlus feature, which you can't use with the dedicated VGA PC port that the TV has. Definitely go with an HDMI connection, even if it's a DVI/VGA to HDMI conversion! You won't regret it.My only gripe is that it doesn't have any Wi-Fi features where I can stream my PC's videos wirelessly. I moved a few months ago and my PC is no longer next to the TV, so I do not use my PC on it anymore. :(

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 in 6300 series TV
Reviews.Author: Thor
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this purchase. I wish it had a zoom for non-HD Programs. The picture is excellant and sound is good.The only suggestion is go to a retail store and make sure the vewing angle will be wide enough for your needs. The vewing angle is notnear as wide as a Panasonic. That being said, I would recommend this TV, and dealing with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Cotton/TN
Reviews.Content: The Samsung AUN40D6300 LED HDTV is great.  Within 10 minutes out of the box I was viewing a picture that was excellent.  This represents my third Samsung TV, quality is great. The sound could be better, guess they want to sell a sound system.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Martha R
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Samsung TV from Amazon Warehouse  as "used, very good" condition, and had some misgivings as to what I would receive.  I think Amazon could have provided  a little more information about what constituted "very good" condition, but  it turned out to be even better than I expected, with only a couple of small scratch marks on the back of the unit. .  Marvelous picture, and the sound is quite good also.  We were upgrading from a 27" set, 10 years old, so are delighted with this new one.  Found it easy to set up and program. I have no fault with it at all, and the price was better than good! All in all, an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jorge Macias
Reviews.Content: does everything it claims. the smart tv feature is very cool. can download netflicks straight from the tv. great picture and lots of other features

Reviews.Title: Stunning picture but web browser is garbage
Reviews.Author: Willy
Reviews.Content: I am very tech savvy and have used, built, and trained people on PC's since 1984.  I don't mind a bit of a challenge but the browser "feature" is a waste of time and very, very slow to use.  Within 1 day of installing the TV I purchased a 25' hdmi cable so I can run my laptop through it.  You will become very frustrated trying to use the browser with the supplied remote.  I can't believe this is on a 2011 model TV, more like some clunky thing from 1995.  Think about using the arrow keys on your computer keyboard to control the cursor...yeah, that's what it is like.  It seriously looks like it was written by some grade 6 kids for a weekend project.Other than that, the picture is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Living Large In The South Bay
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV since the price was really good at Amazon.  I am really happy with the picture quality, color and ease of use.  I looked at several brands before buying and I thought the picture was the best for the price.  The features are great on this model too.  The only thing I was disappointed in was it says it's internet ready, but for this to happen I have to buy the wireless wifi adapter.  I highly recommend this HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46 Super
Reviews.Author: Ronald
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality, easy to use and the people on the screen seem to come out into the room, almost but not quite like 3D.  Extremely happy with purchase.  Can't wait to get another one.

Reviews.Title: Rons LED TV
Reviews.Author: R. Schmitt "car nut"
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the purchase, delivery and operation of the 40 inch samsung led model 6300.The tvis perfect and is exremely HD.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality and the set up is easy.  I read several helpful and lengthy reviews before buying so I will be brief.  This TV is excellent and a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Prasanna Nelabhotla
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN40D6300 and its Apps are good.......We liked it.Sound quality and picture clarity are good.finally we are satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: jself37
Reviews.Content: Fantastic TV, was a little slow with processing for games on the Wii but once you set it to game mode it works almost perfectly, maybe a hair behind in case you are an avid gamer but I believe a receiver would fix that problem. Personally I think the sound is great for a TV speaker and more than adequate unless you are really picky about your sound. Fantastic buy and no complaints so far, about 1 month post purchase.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING TV
Reviews.Author: Happy Mommy "Trishie"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is so amazing it feels like they are going to come through the screen.  Many great updated features I am still learning.  Would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV Quality
Reviews.Author: GYA
Reviews.Content: Is the perfect TV at this moment, good size, good picture and good sound. Internet is easy to use. Is the best option if you are looking a TV for your room. If you are looking a TV for the leaving room I recommend a bigger size.

Reviews.Title: Good TV but strange intermittent crackling sound from back of tv
Reviews.Author: Tc123
Reviews.Content: Purchased this set a couple of months ago and yesterday I noticed intermittent crackling / popping coming from back of the tv. Its doesn't happen when I first turn on the TV but after its been on for a while. Read some reports about some owners experiencing delayed starts, "clicking" sounds, and eventually having the Samsung TVs stop being able to power on due to a bad capacitor,but I have not had any abnormal delayed starts or clicking when I turn it on, only the crackling after its been on a while and it lasts a few minutes then goes away.Also read some people say that its normal and due to the thermal expansion and contraction of the plastic casing.Here ia a direct quote from the Samsung service manual that one reviewer provided:"Any `creaking' noise is mostly from the structure of the device itself. A short, harsh noise may occur from a distortion or malformation due to thermal expansion between the metal joints, screws and loaded parts, respectively. Any intermittent `creaking' noise can be removed by loosening the screws."Just wondering if anyone else has experienced this with their sets so far.

Reviews.Title: Sweet TV
Reviews.Author: LaMans
Reviews.Content: No complaints with this TV. The picture is amazing and everything works. Works well with Xbox and gaming. No visual lag. Not much else to say!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Kelly Uhland
Reviews.Content: Most inportantly for myself... was the delivery issue.... After all this is a physically large item and costly... I was so PLEASED by the professional delivery service... Polite, friendly, set the television completely up...The TV is great... the cable hook-up... so-so --- it involved two visits by the local techs to properly bring in the HD stream...

Reviews.Title: Great Big Chrystal Clear HD Picture!
Reviews.Author: Will Grendahl
Reviews.Content: I'm loving my new HD TV.  The picture is crystal clear.  Since that's the primary purpose of a TV I would highly recommend this set.  I added Tivo from my cable provider and managed to get a promo movie package added at no charge.  The cable guy got me all hooked up. Cable guy said "This Samsung is one of the better ones."  Seeing all the great movies Tivo's given me access to has slowed me down on exploring all the features this very cool and thin Samsung HDTV has.  Even the included base stand has a rich contemporary look.  I'm retired so I'm taking my time getting to know everything about my new Samsung HDTV.  My Samsung research led me to believe it is the top of the line 2D Samsung 46"HDTV.  3D doesn't work for me because of a vision situation.  Buying from Amazon was a good experience and I took advantage of the no interest financing offered.  Delivery was free and in my city no sales tax was a significant savings.  This is my first major purchase from Amazon, however based on how happy I am with the whole experience it won't be the last.

Reviews.Title: 46 inches of Pleasure
Reviews.Author: Dennis Scully
Reviews.Content: This is a birthday gift for the love of my life (my wife).This item was rated as one of the top 46 inch HDTV's on the market.  I did purchase a wall mount, but have not attached it to the wall.  It has a stand that came with it, so I'm using that for now.  My cable company came and set it up correctly, due to me not having the confidence.My wife is very pleased with the t.v., which was my intention.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46d6300
Reviews.Author: Jane Austen "Colorado teacher"
Reviews.Content: Wow, I just love this tv.  I've had it for just over a month. I was nervous to purchase such a large item through Amazon but it got to my house quickly and without any issues.  This tv is so clear and vibrant.  It was a large change/upgrade for me since I had an old 26 inch cathode tv.  The sound is quite good but I will still probably run it through my speakers.  I just have regular rabbit ears for over-the-air tv and the HD channels come in just fine.  Don't believe the hype that you need a HD antenna. Mine was like 10 bucks.PROS--vibrant colors and crystal clear with the LED back-lighting.  Plenty of plug-in options on the back of the tv.  The 46 size is just right for my family room.  My friends have the 40 inch version of this tv and I found it to be a bit small.  I haven't used the internet access too much because I have a slow DSL connection.  But it did work when I tested it.  I like that I will be able to stream things through the tv when I get a faster connection.  You can adjust tv options easily.  At first it all felt too bright and clear for me:-)---now I'm used to it.CONS--I haven't really found any big issues.  Like many have said there can be a "soap opera" effect where people seem to be too much in 3D.  This is EASY to fix if it bothers you.  Go to the settings and change Auto Motion Plus to "off" or "clear".  The Auto Motion plus works great when you're watching sports. You have to do it again sometimes if you are watching a DVD.  The blu ray player seems to have its own settings.  I have a tiny amount of back-light bleed in one corner, it is hardly noticeable to me.

Reviews.Title: For new home it is the best!
Reviews.Author: Randilyne Huckaby "trying to master online sh...
Reviews.Content: we have a small living room so I had no need to go over 46"...while I thinkt he picture might have looked less fake on channels that have green screen backgrounds (comedy central, tosh.O, etc), it is awesome! sports are crystal clear......I can't wait to try the smart tv option, I can't right now because I didn't purchase the wireless internet adapter and don't want to run cords up to my tv since it hangs above my fireplace...I will review the internet portion later!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 55" TV
Reviews.Author: Randal
Reviews.Content: Great color and over all excellent.  No complaints.  No damages due to shipping.  Transaction was smooth from ordering to shipping.

Reviews.Title: Outrageous Picture!
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: My line of work takes me to many different A/V setups. I have yet to see a picture better than this.My only two gripes are the single analog input (which is obviously the trend), and the inability to customize the input names (although, I might be mistaken - the generic list is simply too vague for my liking).

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: ktl
Reviews.Content: Granted, I'm not a huge TV expert, but for my purposes this TV is perfect. Sound is good for my small apartment (I read other reviews where people needed additional speakers), picture quality is excellent, and watching HD movies on this huge screen is a whole 'nother experience. Haven't tried out the internet features yet, but haven't found the need to. I also really like that the stand and frame are discreet, keeping the TV sleek-looking.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Stacy "sllemke"
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with the purchase of this tv.  The picture quality is amazing.  We cannot stop talking about how thin it is, additionally there is very little space around the picture area.  The tv arrived in 2 days and was easy to set up.  My husband had one question and it was quickly answered by the Samsung representative on the phone.  We thought that we had a great tv before but this one is incredible.  The shopping experience with Amazon was wonderful and I highly recommend people shop this way.  Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: Samsung un46d6300 tv
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Great TV picture quality.  Hooked this to Direct TV and wow what a clear picture.  TV has a small footprint.

Reviews.Title: A Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Firstimerhowie
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV purchase, and I am very pleased with it. I had researched tvs for a couple years and I'm assured I made the right choice. I did a wall mount ( very easy ) and it looks great!!! Not to mention that's it is a space saver.  I'm connected to my home network wirelessly using the samsung wifi dongle. I stream music, movies, and photos from my computer. I really like that function. I even surf the net on the big screen. It's also connected to a samsung blu- ray, the picture quality has blown me away! What more can a guy ask for.I need to mention that this was my first major purchase online for which I was very nervous. I received everything as promised and on time. I would highly recommend my experience to anyone .

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture quality with HDTV
Reviews.Author: PawPrints4Ucom
Reviews.Content: I received this TV a few days ago and am very pleased with the picture quality!  I purchased the Samsung because everyone in my family had previously purchased this brand and were so pleased with their TVs.  Most had this brand of TV for over five years and the quality was continuously excellent.  This was the same size but with wireless adapter capabilities.  I have not tried the Netflex movies but plan to do so.  I have watched DVDs and the movie picture is beyond excellent.  I look forward to using this TV for many years. The 46 inch is perfect for my living room.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Rock Gem
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best shopping decisions I have made. Great value for money, perfect picture quality and amazing internet experience! The only reason I gave four stars to the internet browsing experience is because typing using the remote is a little clunky and I will need to buy a 100$ QWERTY keyboard remote from Samsung. It has been two weeks since I received the tv and I am still exploring the features of the tv. GREAT product!

Reviews.Title: Good value - I'd buy again
Reviews.Author: Tim Bloudek
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model after researching several brands and models. This one appeared to meet my needs. I have not spent a great deal of time with all of the features yet but have set it up for use with TiVo, NetFlix and a Blue Ray player. It is different viewing the crisp picture like a direct feed from a video camera. Some people wrote they did not like the soap opera style images. I think I read this can be adjusted. It is different but I am getting used to it and may not even attempt to change the video settings. I am giving it a chance just because it is different does not make it undesirable.The sound is not a big issue for me but I did end up purchasing an LG sound bar for a better sound experience. The sound from the built in speakers was fine but after a week or so I decided I wanted somewhat better quality. I use the sound bar for playing Pandora via Blue Tooth from my iPhone as an added benefit.There are lots of features yet to explore and maybe when it gets colder outside I may take the time to do more with this capable device. It fit my size need of 46"-47" for over our newly installed fireplace. I also wanted LED and at least 120hz. I ran a wired connection because I could so I could not comment on the wireless option since I did not purchase that.I would recommend this product especially if you can get a good price on it. Somewhere between $1000 and 1200 is a good price to me for this product.

Reviews.Title: Extremely pleased
Reviews.Author: Bettyruth Walter
Reviews.Content: I have three Samsung TV sets now, a 37", a 40" and now this 46".  All of them have amazing pictures and sound qualities.I also like the design of this set, with a narrow band frame.  Therefore, you look at the TV picture rather than the frame.  It is very thin and looks great in the room.It was extremely easy to set up, but I have not yet explored all the options - such as the internet connection.I researched this purchase for weeks, using Comsumer Reports, and customer reports - like this one.  And Amazon was easy to work with for delivery, etc.I do indeed recommend this TV set.  (Note that I did not want a 3-D picture!)

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46D6300
Reviews.Author: FL Sue
Reviews.Content: Great LED TV, wonderful picture.  Better audio than the 2010 Samsung 46 inch previously purchased.  Still learning the Smart TV features.  Very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Smart TV (NOT)
Reviews.Author: Ravi
Reviews.Content: Note: This review is entirely about the smartness part of this Smart TV.If you are going to buy this TV because you want to watch videos off the internet using its much taunted full web browser you might be in for a surprise. Because in that process you will be subjected to lot of pain in your palms and in your brain trying to navigate this really stupid browser. As one reviewer here put it, its just like your truck is stuck in mud and you can't get out.You would say I might use Youtube widget but sadly the text entry is really dumb there and you can't even get to your playlists. The phone apps on iphone/andriod don't help much either.I am thinking there is some serious design flaw in the UI because there's no trackball (I think) on their keyboards(you have to buy separately) as well .And the browser crashes often when watching Youtube videos, worse if its a HQ video from VEVO.

Reviews.Title: Samsung  UN40D6300
Reviews.Author: Stanley J. Czuba "Stan C."
Reviews.Content: We needed a flat screen that would fit into a specific size opening and this fit the bill.  Amazon's price made it a "no brainer".  The 6300 was less than Samsung models with fewer features.  Shipping was fast and the unit arrived in perfect condition.  Unit has been working as advertised and has given us no problems.  The cons are the manual and the sound.  The manual is so brief it is worthless and the E-manual (on screen) is not much better.  The sound is acceptable but not great.  We will eventually purcahse a sound bar to improve the sound.  Picture is great with many screen adjustments possible.  I would purchase the set,at Amazon's price, again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40D6300
Reviews.Author: Jeff Reeves
Reviews.Content: Please do not buy this item. THE TRUTH: The clarity is amazingly good. Great apps; however, the web browser is hopeless. The processor in tv is simply not capable enough to handle the browser. You press the down arrow to make the cursor go down - it goes down real slow and suddenly, it shoots down and you missed your target. Finally you get the vertical location and then you move the cursor left and right ten times to get the horizontal location. You also don't get a querty keyboard; which means you press each number multiple times to get a letter. Which is fine. I do it on my phone to text. But here, since the processor is soo slow, you press 2 to get "a" nothing happens. you press it again and you suddenly get "b." it is extreamly frustrating. Lastly, even though the clarity is good, my TV cannot do pitch black screen since the greyish white light leaks through the corners and right in the middle of my screen I have another big patch of greyish white.

Reviews.Title: LED screen blew after 6 months
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: This was my second samsung tv and I had a great experience with my first one (it still works).  For this unit, the LED backlight blew out after owning it for only 6 months.  Amazon won't get involved with the replacement/repair because it's outside the return window.  Samsung said they'll replace the part but it's on back order and could be months to get a new part.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, superb picture, BUT
Reviews.Author: Dala K. Campbell "DK"
Reviews.Content: What Fry's didn't tell me after they told me it was wifi ready to go, was , that will be another $80.00 to get the adapter.(What Adapte?) It wouldn't have been a problem had I not had to drive 50 miles one way to get one, after I had the TV set up. Expectations that customers know these things or should know, is just plain wishful thinking. So, I purchased one here on line with Amazon for 2/3's the price and they mailed it to me. Humm, and tell me again why the big box stores can't compete.

Reviews.Title: Nice choice - no complaints
Reviews.Author: colleenr
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture, nice T.V.  Could have better sound...but it doesn't really matter as we have a sound system.  No complaints - love it!

Reviews.Title: This may be a SMART TV but SAMSUNG isn't SMART!
Reviews.Author: Jilla "Jilla"
Reviews.Content: Pros :1. When you sit straight, the TV is awesome! HD & SD channells are superb.2. #1 is the only Pros I could find!!Cons :1. My 2 year old Panny Bluray plays videos (when connected to LAN or Wireless) non-stop, but even with LAN this TV has "circles going on" in the middle of the picture!!2. The screws to the stand are not "small" but "Tiny" (lol). You really need to be very careful & efficient to be able to put them together. It needed 3 of us to do it!3. Major flaw to me is if you are even 20 degree off-angle to the TV, the picture Quality suffers. Go to BESTBUY & see this SAMSUNG, SONY  & SHARP (830U model). SHarp LC52830U model is superb even at 90 degree off-angle. Sony is good too to a reasonable off-angle.4. They have something called "Fit to Screen" to fit SD channels which are not 1080P. When you do that, it doesn't fit the screen but fills may be 20% more! Why Samsung? Why?Overall I am disappointed with buying this TV. I bought it from Paul's Thru AMazon. If PAUL Would take it back, I would gladly return this & buy the 52" SHARP 52LE835U (or 830U).My suggesion to buyers is "Please go to some store and see for yourself" and not just read reviews & features and buy.Final Remark : SAMSUNG Sux compared to my 7 year old SONY or 2 year old LED Sharp TV (700un model).Samsung UN55D6300 55-Inch 1080p 120Hz LED HDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Roger B. Hansen "Motorcycle golfer"
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for about three weeks and think that it is one of the best you can buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: slow start & browser crashes
Reviews.Author: sreek
Reviews.Content: 1) Web Browser of Smart Tv crashes very frequently and the power has to be replugged to get it working again2) Slow... smart tv console takes almost 30 secs to open after switching on the tvAll in all a good tvUpdate:Sometimes I get this error "Network interference occurred" all the time.... and even after few restarts the apps cannot connect to the internet... decreasing the rating...

Reviews.Title: CANNOT WATCH INTERNET VIDEO on FULL SCREEN
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: I paid extra for this TV for its web browser function. However, after a few days, the full screen function to watch internet video stops working. I can use the browser to call up a Youtube video but when I attempt to switch to full screen, the TV shuts off the browser.Disappointing ....

Reviews.Title: Crappy HDMI connection
Reviews.Author: baoniao
Reviews.Content: The basic functionality of the TV was fine until I tried to connect it to a PC. It is a complete disaster. It keeps saying something like "No connection, check source". Each time I need to shut down the TV and the laptop and luckily after a couple of trials the connection might "magically" work. I believe this is a design flaw of Samsung. Be careful if you want to use the TV as a monitor for the PC.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but remote is a FAIL
Reviews.Author: Dominick Paul
Reviews.Content: TV is great, and apps are great. I love it!However, for dropping $2k on a TV I'd expect it to at least have a remote that can be programmed to control a cable box (STB). I have never encountered a modern TV that whose remote couldn't be set to control another device.My $500 32 inch Vizio was able to take over my Uverse STB with ease.For those of you considering this TV beware that the remote cannot be programmed to control anything else whatsoever! So you'll have to plop another hundred for a Harmony. Oh, and this device spec is not available in harmony's database yet, you have to use the C model as a substitute, which does not work perfectly.FOR SHAME SAMSUNG - FOR SHAME! I cannot even imagine your excuse.

Reviews.Title: Capacitor blew - TV clicks on and off endlessly
Reviews.Author: Customer9696
Reviews.Content: This TV was great... everyone loved it... for about 6 months until a capcitor blew, and now it is completely inoperable. Apparently this isn't a new problem. I see reviews on TVs from 2008 built by Samsung that have the same problem. The must want the capacitors to blow so people just go buy new ones. Capacitors are built to last so long depending on the materials used. Samsung must have only wanted there's to last a few years. Well guess what? In their LED TVs these things blow too early for their liking. There is actually a class action law suit against Samsung for the capacitors that I learned about.I DO NOT RECOMMEND BUYING ANY SAMSUNG TVs! THEY DO HAVE GREAT PICTURES, BUT THEY WILL INEVITABLY BREAK and become completely inoperable, just like my TV did today!

Reviews.Title: Amazon Company Deceiving their customers on this TV
Reviews.Author: Pocholo Flores
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung TV couple of weeks ago and found out they gave me  the right model # but a different one for what they are describing in their website, They said this TV is 120 Hz but if you look at the back of the TV it's only 60Hz and the first time you turned on the TV it will clearly says 60Hz at the upper left side of the screen,second they said when describing this TV that it has the slim frame of 0.5 inch frame but if you measure the frame on this one it's 1.5 inches frame!!!! not a big difference but that is their selling point on this TV 120Hz 0.5 inch but they will give you a product that is different  from what they describing on website.So I asked customer service about it and they said they will give me a replacement for it so they did and this morning I got the replacement guess what the same TV 60Hz 1.5 Inches frame,so I probably gonna return this item again...buyer beware!!! Don't get me wrong the quality of picture on this TV is awesome!! but I wonder what if I had the 120Hz one and the 0.5 inch frame? that they promise to give me.....

ENERGY STAR standards
